data.message: Facebook, please stop the video's from auto playing.  I have a limited data allowance account and your stupid auto play video's are eating up  my data allowance.  Either give me back the option to play a video when I want or you'll have one less customer.

replies.message: Bye steve!!! No one will miss u!!!! LOL
Pretty funny Jen.  You must be one of those Kool-Aid drinking, low information liberals who doesn't know proper grammar syntax.

Steve, in the settings menu of the Facebook app for Android there is a check box where you can instruct the app to "auto-play videos on Wi-Fi only." I would imagine other operating systems' apps also have this option.
I'll take a look.  Thanks Aaron.
Steve, I'm on satellite internet and am having the same issue, did you find a solution?
I'm on satellite too and didn't find a solution.  I wish FB would understand that there a lot of people who can't get and don't have unlimited internet data usage.

does the same for us in our household too. it slows our computers down when they auto play cant scroll through the feed. if theres too many in the feed they will all play at once then locks everything up. i cant find no settings to stop this. not using a phone.
